outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: TOKTEN, like other CD interventions, has been extended to allign with support to implementation of the PRS of GOL which was from July 2008 to June 2011- end date recently extended to 31 Dec 2011.

project_descr: USAID support to TOKTEN, like other CD interventions, is a project aligned with end date for the extended implementation of the Poverty Reduction strategy that contributes to building  surge capacity through the attraction of Liberians from the Diaspora
